name: SubmarineCraft
detailed_description:
The seabed is a beautiful and unknown new world. Exploring this unknown world is something that human beings have been trying to do.

SubmarineCraft is a game of freely building underwater vehicles to explore the ocean.

Here, you can build old steam ships, high-tech super submarines, or deep submarines for scientific research.

The game offers dozens of blocks to build submarines in your heart and explore the mysterious underwater world. Each square has its own physical characteristics.

There is no blood strip in the game, including the buoyancy of the submarine, all using real-time physical simulation.



[Game features]

1. The quality of submarine depends on your design!

2. Game system to meet the energy conservation, need players to master heat, pressure and other factors, physical simulation favorite!

3. Floating and submerging depend on the amount of water in the ballast tank.

short_description: SubmarineCraft is a game of freely building ships or submarines to explore the ocean. The game offers dozens of blocks to build your submarine in your mind to fight against enemy ships. Each block has its own physical characteristics. There is no blood strip in the game, instead of real-time physical simulation.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10 64 bit
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
